content.rendered:
Directed by Hansal Mehta

Written by Luv Ranjan. Aseem Arrora. Zeishan Quadri. Luv Ranjan. Sumeet Bishnoi

Cast Rajkummar Rao (Mahinder Hooda ‘Montu’). Nushrratt Bharuccha (Neelima ‘Neelu’ (as Nushrat Bharucha)). Mohd. Zeeshan Ayyub (I.M. Singh (as Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub)). Saurabh Shukla (Shukla). Satish Kaushik (Montu’s Father). Ila Arun (Principal Ushal Gehlot). Jatin Sarna (Dimpy Chautala). Baljinder Kaur (Montu’s Mother). Naman Jain (Bablu). Garima Kaur (Pinky). Rajiv Gupta (Neelima’s Father). Suparna Marwah (Neelima’s Mother). Anil Chaudhary (Maths Professor). Vishal Ajmaria (KID). Akash (KID). Anmol Bajaj (KID). Anvita Bhargavva (KID). Tanishq Chaudhary (Kid (credit only)). Ranjeet Chauhan (Peon).Akash Chawariya. Gourav Chiller (KID). Virender Commando (Ombir Chaudhary). Ajay Dalal (KID). Deedakk Dalal (KID). Himanshu Dalal (KID). Gowrav (KID). Himanshi (KID). Avni Jain (KID). Dev Joon (KID). Karthikay (KID). Amit Khatri (KID). Ankit Khatri (KID). Kunika (KID). Prayrak Mehta (Lokesh). Indu Mughal (KID). Kirti Nain (KID). Nakul (KID). Naveen (KID). Aarnav Manish Parab (KID). Hiren Patel (KID). Umair Patel (Musical Artist (archive sound)). Kapil Raathe (KID). Harsh Sharma (KID). Deependra Singh (Kabbdi Player). Hetashi Guru Singh (KID). Manasvi Soni (KID)

Languages Hindi

Producers Amit J. Chaudhary. Ajay Devgn. Ankur Garg. Ashish Kathpal. Roopali Narayan. Luv Ranjan. Ravi Sarin. Avinash Shah. Sheetal Singh Yaduvanshi

Production Ajay Devgn Ffilm. Luv Film
